医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
夜间接触人造光会增加老年性黄斑变性的风险韩国的一项研究发现，夜间更多地接触户外人造光会显着增加患渗出性年龄相关性黄斑变性的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Night-time-artificial-light-exposure-linked-to-increased-risk-of-age-lated-maulous-degenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Night-time-artificial-light-exposure-linked-to-increased-risk-of-age-lated-maulous-degenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1272b477-d387-4245-82e2-14a67ed84ce7 Tue, 16 Jan 2024 19:16:00 -0500 Night-time artificial light exposure linked to increased risk of age-related macular degeneration
疾病预防控制中心的报告强调迫切需要遵守抗真菌药物处方指南疾病预防控制中心对医疗保险 D 部分受益人的研究显示，局部抗真菌药物的处方率和成本很高，强调在抗菌药物耐药性真菌感染不断增加的情况下，需要制定适当的处方指南。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/CDC-report-highlights-urgent-need-for-guideline-adherence-in-prescribing-antifungal-medications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/CDC-report-highlights-urgent-need-for-guideline-adherence-in-prescribing-antifungal-medications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=59be789d-1c21-4db4-8d2f-76f04c65987e Tue, 16 Jan 2024 18:54:00 -0500 CDC report highlights urgent need for guideline adherence in prescribing antifungal medications
医学界呼吁针对气候和生物多样性危机作为全球卫生紧急事件采取统一行动BMC公共卫生杂志的一篇社论敦促联合国和卫生专业人员将相互交织的气候和生物多样性危机宣布为全球卫生紧急事件，并强调需要采取综合解决方案来解决这些相互依存的问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Medical-community-calls-for-unified-action-on-climate-and-biodiversity-crises-as-global-health-emergency.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Medical-community-calls-for-unified-action-on-climate-and-biodiversity-crises-as-global-health-emergency.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aff36b69-38eb-48ca-b15d-e05451670e13 Tue, 16 Jan 2024 18:18:00 -0500 Medical community calls for unified action on climate and biodiversity crises as global health emergency
研究发现，较高的抗氧化剂摄入量与女性腰痛风险相关研究调查了膳食抗氧化剂摄入量与腰痛之间的联系，结果表明较高的抗氧化剂水平，尤其是硒和锌，可能会降低美国女性腰痛的可能性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Higher-antibiotic-intake-linked-to-lower-back-pain-risk-in-women-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Higher-antibiotic-intake-linked-to-lower-back-pain-risk-in-women-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ac2e16d-e380-44db-86a6-818f79827b1d Tue, 16 Jan 2024 18:04:00 -0500 Higher antioxidant intake linked to lower back pain risk in women, study finds
研究显示腺病毒疫苗可能会略微增加格林-巴利综合征的风险研究调查了 COVID-19 疫苗与自身免疫/神经系统疾病之间的联系，重点关注与腺病毒载体疫苗相关的格林-巴利综合征 (GBS) 风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Study-shows-slight-increase-in-Guillain-Barre-syndrome-risk-with-adenovirus-COVID-vaccines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Study-shows-slight-increase-in-Guillain-Barre-syndrome-risk-with-adenovirus-COVID-vaccines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d00e6c74-e798-40c9-abfb-2e6c2fe56fac Tue, 16 Jan 2024 17:53:00 -0500 Study shows slight increase in Guillain-Barre syndrome risk with adenovirus COVID vaccines
英国范围内的新冠疫苗接种覆盖率研究揭示了差距和可预防的住院治疗根据第一项关于整个英国人口的 COVID-19 疫苗覆盖率的研究，到 2022 年夏季，英国四个国家中有三分之一到一半的人口没有接种建议数量的新冠疫苗和加强疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/UK-wide-COVID-vaccination-coverage-study-reveals-gaps-and-preventable-hospitalizations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/UK-wide-COVID-vaccination-coverage-study-reveals-gaps-and-preventable-hospitalizations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=439744ee-1553-4839-9c90-8b6bef6453b7 Tue, 16 Jan 2024 12:22:54 -0500 UK-wide COVID vaccination coverage study reveals gaps and preventable hospitalizations
尿素驱动的纳米机器人可将小鼠膀胱肿瘤减少 90%这项在小鼠身上进行的研究展示了这些微小的纳米机器如何通过尿液中的尿素推动并精确瞄准肿瘤，并利用其表面携带的放射性同位素攻击肿瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Urea-powered-nanorobots-reduce-bladder-tumors-by-9025-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Urea-powered-nanorobots-reduce-bladder-tumors-by-9025-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3005506d-6e36-40bb-9de7-4d95c5d208fc Tue, 16 Jan 2024 12:06:10 -0500 Urea-powered nanorobots reduce bladder tumors by 90% in mice
阿姆斯特丹 UMC 项目旨在利用盖茨的资助开发第一种有效的艾滋病毒疫苗据估计，全世界有 4000 万人感染艾滋病毒。这个群体的三分之二在非洲大陆。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Amsterdam-UMC-project-aims-for-first- effective-HIV-vaccine-with-Gates-funding.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Amsterdam-UMC-project-aims-for-first- effective-HIV-vaccine-with-Gates-funding.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d580eac7-e21f-45e2-8924-c1e3eea8fed5 Tue, 16 Jan 2024 11:54:01 -0500 Amsterdam UMC project aims for first effective HIV vaccine with Gates funding
青春期的高脂肪量可能会加剧成年早期的胰岛素抵抗和肥胖一项新的研究显示，青春期的高脂肪量会导致胰岛素抵抗，这可能会导致胰岛素抵抗恶化和成年后肥胖的恶性循环。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/High-fat-mass-in-adolescent-could-worsen-insulin-resistance-and-obesity-by-young-adulthood.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/High-fat-mass-in-adolescent-could-worsen-insulin-resistance-and-obesity-by-young-adulthood.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=470ce7d7-a5b7-4883-90c7-defea05e1035 Tue, 16 Jan 2024 11:49:16 -0500 High fat mass in adolescence could worsen insulin resistance and obesity by young adulthood
新的粉尘测试方法更好地保护工人免受肺部疾病的侵害昆士兰大学研究人员开发的一种新的粉尘测试方法可以为工人提供更好的保护，使其免受黑肺病和矽肺病等疾病的侵害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/New-dust-testing-methodology-better-protects-workers-from-lung-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/New-dust-testing-methodology-better-protects-workers-from-lung-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3022e48-ed3a-4e5f-ae74-54c1b4019165 Tue, 16 Jan 2024 09:36:01 -0500 New dust testing methodology better protects workers from lung diseases
